recognitionModel.description: Client pays 12 months upfront, receives 18 months of content (6 months free). Revenue recognized monthly over 18 months

cac.note: Since clients pay annually upfront, CAC payback is almost immediate

ltv.note: LTV = average annual price since clients pay upfront

ltvCacRatio.note: Excellent ratio - means every SAR invested in marketing returns 16 SAR

breakEven.note: Break-even calculated dynamically: Monthly Costs ÷ Average Monthly Revenue Per Client. Updates automatically when any costs change.

cashFlow.description: Clients pay full annual fee upfront, providing immediate positive cash flow

deferredRevenue.description: Revenue recognized over 18 months (12 months paid)
deferredRevenue.recognitionRate: 55.6% of annual payment recognized in first year

notes: Monthly costs stable in initial phase (32,350 SAR/month)
